body:
Hi guys, this is the message I get when trying to run simulations. (Solution exception:global name 'gh' is not defined)



Can you help? Cheers, David
topic: ERROR: Solution exception:global name 'gh' is not defined

replies.body:
Hi,

A list of ground temperature is to be provided. You may use the native grasshopper series component to generate a list of 12 items with the value of 16.
Thank you very much Devang Chauhan.
